originalTitle: Russian 'pick-up artist' accused of secretly filming women in Ghana
title: Russian 'pick-up artist' accused of secretly filming women in Ghana
content: Ghana has called on Russia to extradite the man, who is accused of recording sexual encounters without consent.

originalTitle: Planned US-funded baby vaccine trial in Guinea-Bissau blasted by WHO
title: Planned US-funded baby vaccine trial in Guinea-Bissau blasted by WHO
content: Giving some newborns in Guinea-Bissau an established hepatitis B treatment but not others is "unethical", it says.

originalTitle: Kenyans drop flowers for Valentine's bouquets of cash. Not everyone is impressed
title: Kenyans drop flowers for Valentine's bouquets of cash. Not everyone is impressed
content: Bouquets of cash have been blooming in popularity in Kenya but recent warnings may slow the trend.

originalTitle: Thousands of Western nationals fought Israel’s war on Gaza: What to know
title: Thousands of Western nationals fought Israel’s war on Gaza: What to know
content: Thousands of Western citizens joined the Israeli military in its war on Gaza that killed over 72,000 Palestinians.

originalTitle: As Sudanese city returns to life after two-year siege, drone threat lingers
title: As Sudanese city returns to life after two-year siege, drone threat lingers
content: Markets reopen in Dilling, South Kordofan’s second largest city. Yet residents face persistent aerial attacks.

originalTitle: Iran seeks to get out of FATF blacklist amid domestic political divisions
title: Iran seeks to get out of FATF blacklist amid domestic political divisions
content: North Korea and Myanmar are other two countries on global financial blacklist as Tehran promises countermeasures.

originalTitle: Iran ready to discuss compromises to reach nuclear deal, minister tells BBC in Tehran
title: Iran ready to discuss compromises to reach nuclear deal, minister tells BBC in Tehran
content: Majid Takht-Ravanchi, Iran's deputy foreign minister, tells the BBC's Lyse Doucet that the ball was "in America's court to prove that they want to do a deal".

originalTitle: Eleven killed in Israeli strikes on Gaza, rescuers say
title: Eleven killed in Israeli strikes on Gaza, rescuers say
content: The Palestinian Red Crescent say a strike on a tent encampment in northern Gaza killed at least six people.

originalTitle: Russia killed opposition leader Alexei Navalny using dart frog toxin, UK says
title: Russia killed opposition leader Alexei Navalny using dart frog toxin, UK says
content: There is no innocent explanation for the toxin being found in samples taken from Navalny's body, Foreign Office says.

originalTitle: Pereira announced as Forest boss on 18-month deal
title: Pereira announced as Forest boss on 18-month deal
content: Nottingham Forest appoint Vitor Pereira on an 18-month deal as the 57-year-old becomes the club's fourth manager of the campaign.

originalTitle: 'I'm buzzing' - Man Utd's Skinner toasts seventh-straight win
title: 'I'm buzzing' - Man Utd's Skinner toasts seventh-straight win
content: Manchester United are getting the job done when it matters most - and their seven-game winning streak has gone under the radar.

originalTitle: Salah shines as Liverpool comfortably beat Brighton
title: Salah shines as Liverpool comfortably beat Brighton
content: Goals from Curtis Jones, Dominik Szoboszlai and Mohamed Salah give Liverpool a comfortable 3-0 win over Brighton in the fourth round of the FA Cup at Anfield.
